C

calculateLength(double, double, double, double) - Static method in class utilities.Utilities
Uses the pythagorean theorem to calculate the distance that the turtle moved by finding the length of the hypotenuse of the triangle formed by the two sets of coordinates.

ClearScreen - Class in commands.view
